item.title: 炼油商Eneos将扩大日本以外的石油贸易业务
item.description: 日本最大炼油商Eneos控股公司计划扩大团队规模，以在新加坡等海外办事处开展更多石油衍生品交易，旨在加强其在主要贸易枢纽的存在感。【原文：Eneos Holdings Inc. plans to expand its team to handle more oil-derivative trading at its overseas offices including Singapore, as Japan’s largest refiner looks to increase its presence at major trading hubs.】

item.title: 富士媒体宣布大规模回购股份以驱逐激进股东
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司公布了一项大规模股票回购计划，以抵御激进投资者村上义明，这标志着日本近年来最引人注目的企业争夺战之一正式落幕。【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc. has unveiled a massive share buyback plan to repel activist investor Yoshiaki Murakami, effectively ending one of Japan’s most high-profile corporate battles in recent years.】

item.title: 中美互联网的惊人相似之处
item.description:
尽管规则大相径庭，它们在重要方面却趋于一致

【原文：

Despite very different rules, they've converged in important ways

】

item.title: 零散话题：中美互联网的相似之处（播客）
item.description: 90年代，人们热议互联网将成为推动世界自由化的力量。比尔·克林顿曾作出著名预言：中国不可能封锁互联网，这将对国内政治产生深远影响。 当然，这些预言并未成真——中国在防火墙内内容管控方面成效卓著。但更值得注意的是，互联网在美国同样未能产生预期的自由化效应。在本期播客中，我们将探讨——【原文：In the 90s, there was a lot of talk about how the Internet would be a liberalizing force in the world. Bill Clinton famously predicted that it would be impossible for China to lock down the Internet, and that this would have profound effects on domestic politics. Of course that didn’t come true — China has done a remarkable job of controlling what gets behind the firewall. But then furthermore, the Internet hasn’t had the liberalizing effects in the US either. On this episode of the podcast, we】

item.title: 欧元区银行意外收紧企业信贷标准
item.description: 欧元区银行在2025年底意外收紧了企业信贷标准，这在欧洲央行本周设定利率之前，引发了对投资和经济活动的质疑。【原文：Euro-zone banks unexpectedly tightened corporate credit standards at the end of 2025, raising doubts about investment and economic activity before the European Central Bank sets interest rates this week.】

item.title: 第一生命保险连续第三年平均加薪7%
item.description: 据发言人透露，第一生命控股公司计划在2026年4月开始的财年中，平均提高约7%的工资。【原文：Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc. plans to raise wages by about 7% on average in the fiscal year starting April 2026, according to a spokesperson.】

item.title: 铂金公司预计上半年利润激增400%，得益于金属价格上涨
item.description: 英帕拉铂金控股公司表示，受金属价格上涨推动，其下半年利润同比增幅可能达到约400%。【原文：Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd. said its second-half profit likely jumped by about 400% from a year earlier because of the rally in metals.】

item.title: 科威特向外国投资开放油田和输油管道
item.description: 科威特正向外国投资者开放部分油田，并出租其部分输油管道网络。作为欧佩克成员国，此举旨在将科威特打造为中东地区的重要投资目的地。【原文：Kuwait is opening up some of its oil fields to foreign investment and leasing part of its pipeline network, a significant move by the OPEC member as it looks to position itself as a key investment destination in the Middle East.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会称，2026年及之后美国航空旅行增速将落后于全球水平
item.description: 全球领先的航空协会负责人在新加坡航展上表示，美国国内航空需求在短期内难以追上国际市场的增长势头。【原文：Travel demand in the US is unlikely to catch up to international growth in the near future, the head of the leading global aviation association said at the Singapore Airshow.】

item.title: 富士传媒宣布15亿美元回购计划，激进股东或退出
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司宣布将回购价值最高达2350亿日元（约合15亿美元）的本公司股票，且激进投资者将参与其中，这标志着管理层与股东之间持续数月的对峙局面可能迎来终结。【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc. said it will buy back up to ¥235 billion ($1.5 billion) of its shares and that activist investors will participate, marking a possible end to a months-long standoff between management and stockholders.】

item.title: 英国食品杂货通胀放缓，消费者紧缩开支寻求促销优惠
item.description: 英国食品杂货价格通胀降至4月以来最低水平，因消费者转向超市自有品牌产品和促销商品。【原文：UK grocery price inflation eased to its lowest level since April, as Britons opted for supermarkets’ own-brand products and promotional items.】

item.title: 法国通胀率意外跌至五年低点
item.description: 法国通胀率意外回落至五年低点，在能源价格下跌的推动下，该数据仍远低于欧洲央行的2%目标。【原文：French inflation unexpectedly eased to a five-year low, staying well short of the European Central Bank’s 2% target as energy prices fell.】

item.title: FDA拒绝阿斯利康狼疮药物的自我注射版本
item.description: 美国食品药品监督管理局拒绝了阿斯利康公司一种用于治疗狼疮的皮下给药版本药物，该版本本可使药物更易于使用。【原文：The US Food and Drug Administration rejected a subcutaneous version of AstraZeneca Plc’s lupus medicine that would make it easier to administer.】

item.title: 普尔巴亚称MSCI警告利好印尼，看好经济增长前景
item.description: 印尼财政部长普尔巴亚·尤迪·萨德瓦表示，上周明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）关于企业透明度的警告引发当地股市暴跌，但这对印尼经济而言反而是机遇。他坚称印尼经济基本面强劲。【原文：Indonesian Finance Minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa said a warning about corporate transparency from MSCI Inc. last week, which triggered a slump in local stocks, represents an opportunity for an economy which he defended as fundamentally robust.】

item.title: 奥斯特德以14亿欧元将欧洲陆上风电业务出售给CIP集团
item.description: 奥斯特德公司已同意以14亿欧元（约合16.5亿美元）的价格将其欧洲陆上业务出售给丹麦投资者哥本哈根基础设施合伙公司。【原文：Orsted A/S has agreed to sell its European onshore business to Danish investor Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners for €1.4 billion ($1.65 billion).】

item.title: 印度首席顾问称美印协议后经济增长将超预期
item.description: 印度首席经济顾问表示，在美国大幅降低对印度商品的关税后，印度经济增速可能超过政府此前预测。【原文：India’s economy could grow even faster than the government’s earlier forecast after the US substantially lowered tariffs on Indian goods, the country’s chief economic adviser said.】

item.title: 中国拟增持铜储备以保障供应安全
item.description: 据一位金属行业高管透露，中国希望增加国家储备中的铜储备量。此举将加剧铜价上涨压力，并凸显各国政府为保障供应安全而采取的日益强化的举措。【原文：China wants more copper in its state stockpiles, according to a senior metals industry official, a move that would add to upward pressure on prices and highlight a growing push by governments to bolster supply security.】

item.title: 土耳其1月通胀率降至30.7%，降幅低于预期
item.description: 土耳其通胀率在1月份连续第四个月放缓，但由于食品和其他商品的季节性价格上涨，降幅低于分析师预期。【原文：Turkish inflation slowed for the fourth month in a row in January, albeit less than analysts expected due to seasonal price rises on food and other goods.】

item.title: 中国白银基金重估引发31%暴跌，投资者强烈反对
item.description: 瑞银深投信基金管理公司调整了其22亿美元白银基金的估值模型，以更紧密地追踪全球期货价格，此举导致该基金净资产价值创纪录下跌，引发投资者强烈抗议——这些投资者此前已因贵金属价格暴跌遭受重创。【原文：UBS SDIC Fund Management Co. changed the valuation model for a $2.2 billion silver fund to more closely track global futures prices, triggering a record drop in its net asset value and outcry among investors already bruised by a precious metals slump.】

item.title: 任天堂利润令人失望，内存价格上涨构成压力
item.description: 任天堂公司公布的季度利润增幅低于预期，尽管Switch 2主机销量稳健，但这加剧了业界对内存芯片成本上涨的担忧。【原文：Nintendo Co. reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly profit gain despite solid sales of the Switch 2, fueling concern about the rising cost of memory chips.】

item.title: 金银价格反弹，英国股市将保持平稳
印度珠宝制造商Emerald Jewel宣布计划进行首次公开募股，融资规模最高达3亿美元。
item.description: 知情人士透露，印度最大的珠宝制造商之一翡翠珠宝工业有限公司正考虑进行首次公开募股，预计融资规模可达3亿美元，这可能为印度珠宝行业最大规模的上市铺平道路。【原文：Emerald Jewel Industry India Ltd., one of the country’s largest jewelry manufacturers, is weighing an initial public offering that could raise as much as $300 million, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially paving the way for India’s biggest listings in the sector.】

item.title: 阿克苏诺贝尔警告称今年将面临艰难局面，盈利改善幅度有限
item.description: 阿克苏诺贝尔公司预计2026年盈利改善有限，这家荷兰涂料制造商正面临客户需求疲软的困境——在持续的经济不确定性面前，客户正收紧开支。【原文：Akzo Nobel NV sees little earnings improvement in 2026 as the Dutch paint maker contends with sluggish demand from customers who are reining in spending in the face of persistent economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 香港顶级开发商在停滞后寻求6.4亿美元贷款
item.description: 香港最大开发商新鸿基地产有限公司正寻求至少50亿港元（6.4亿美元）的贷款，这是该公司去年跳过年度再融资后重返市场。【原文：Hong Kong’s largest developer Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. is seeking a loan of at least HK$5 billion ($640 million), returning to the market after skipping its annual refinancing last year.】

item.title: 匈牙利大胆押注吸引投资者，关键大选临近
item.description: 在可能重新定义匈牙利未来的选举前夕，投资者正加码押注该国的股票、债券和货币。【原文：Investors are stepping up bold wagers on Hungary’s stocks, bonds and currency ahead of elections that could redefine the country’s future.】

item.title: 欧瑞泽与潘神集团达成4.8亿欧元信贷二级基金交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻获得的声明显示，资产管理公司欧瑞泽（Eurazeo SE）已为其私募信贷续期基金募集4.8亿欧元资金，并与二级市场投资者潘神资本（Pantheon）达成合作。【原文：Asset manager Eurazeo SE has collected €480 million for a private credit continuation fund, partnering with secondaries investor Pantheon, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 安巴尼、阿达尼集团股价在美印贸易协议后飙升
item.description: 印度与美国宣布达成备受期待的贸易协议后，亿万富翁穆克什·安巴尼和高塔姆·阿达尼旗下的旗舰企业股价飙升，此举缓解了持续数月的地缘政治紧张局势。【原文：The flagship firms of billionaires Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani saw their shares surge after India and the US announced a much-awaited trade pact, easing months of geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 新世界股份因黑石谈判涨势回吐涨幅
item.description: 香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司股价已回落至上周传出黑石集团正洽谈成为其最大单一股东消息前的水平，因市场对其未来发展路径的疑虑日益加剧。【原文：Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. has fallen back in the stock market to where it traded before news last week that Blackstone Inc. was in talks to become its single largest shareholder, as questions mount about the path forward.】

item.title: 印度出口有望增长，因美国将关税削减至18%
item.description: 美国降低印度商品进口关税后，印度出口商将迎来发展机遇。此举缓解了数月来的不确定性，并引发印度国内市场大幅上涨。【原文：Indian exporters are set for a boost after the US lowered tariffs on shipments from the country, a move that eased months of uncertainty and triggered a sharp rally in local markets.】

item.title: 汇丰策略师称需警惕信贷领域"人工智能狂热"
item.description: 汇丰银行策略师指出，在市场对人工智能技术的乐观情绪推动收益率溢价降至数十年最低水平后，信贷投资者应警惕与"人工智能狂热"相关的潜在下行风险。【原文：Credit investors should guard against potential downside risks tied to “AI exuberance” after optimism around the technology helped yield premiums drop to their lowest in decades, according to HSBC Bank strategists.】
